programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Believing him to be the prophesied leader, the tribe’s chief, Balau, helps Sandokan uncover his past, despite his son Lang’s jealousy. As Sandokan makes progress, he and Marianne confess their love for each other. Yanez argues with Sandokan not to get involved with the Dayak’s struggle and leaves. Sandokan discovers his tribe was massacred under orders from Marianne’s father. The lovers fall out, and Brooke rescues Marianne.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1
programme.desc: In this wish from Emerald’s deep past, Ruby must resolve a family feud and misunderstanding before it’s too late. Meanwhile, the well is threatened.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S2
programme.desc: Ruby struggles both to save the well and grant the wish of an enemy of the community.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S2
programme.desc: Ruby helps a wisher find a very special someone.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Jack Black is Po, the unlikely hero chosen to fulfill an ancient kung fu prophecy in this delightful animation voiced by a star-studded cast.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: “Top Chef” Kentucky begins as fifteen of the country’s finest chefs are off to the races at Churchill Downs for the ride of their lives.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: A very pregnant Gail Simmons asks the chefs to feed her cravings in a special Quickfire delivery. Then it’s time to celebrate two iconic Kentucky mainstays: local cuisine and bourbon. The Chefs head to Makers Mark, the oldest distillery in America to put their spins on a meal full of Kentucky classics including burgoo, Benedictine, mutton, hoe cakes and dumplings. This is a true battle for Kentucky as the chefs navigate their first team challenge – and one chef makes a potentially fatal shopping error. Can they recover or will they be scraping the bottom of the barrel to make it through? Food and travel editor, Nilou Motamed joins the judges this season, and Maker’s Mark’s in-house Chef, Newman Miller, sits on the panel as a guest judge.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: It’s holiday time for Top Chef, and Richard Blais and Brooke Williamson help spread the festive cheer by presenting a white elephant Quickfire challenge. Then, the Chefs receive an unexpected gift as Michelin starred super Chef Eric Ripert sits down with them to celebrate an elaborate traditional French Chrismas dinner. However, once the last bite is taken, Padma informs the Chefs that they’re missing the final part of the tradition of Le Revillon de Noel… the presentation of 13 desserts. It’s a midnight pastry free-for-all as the Chefs try to avoid being on the placed on the naughty list.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: In a massive twist, Padma’s favorite challenge Restaurant Wars comes early this year, but before the chefs gear up for battle, they must first duke it out in an amuse bouche-based Quickfire for Top Chef alum turned James Beard Award winning chefs: Karen Akunowicz and Nina Compton. Then, the gauntlet has been thrown and with twelve chefs remaining, three restaurants will be battling for victory. James Beard Award winning restaurateur Caroline Styne joins as the guest judge along with Nilou Motamed. And if this unexpected chaos isn’t enough, Tom leaves the Chefs breathless with an announcement that will change the course of the competition.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: The mayhem and drama continues of the biggest Restaurant Wars in the history of “Top Chef.” Tom’s announcement of a double elimination piles on even more pressure. “Top Chef” alum turned James Beard Award winning Chefs Karen Akunowicz and Nina Compton join the restaurant crawl along with Nilou Motamed and guest judge and James Beard Award winning restaurateur, Caroline Styne.

programme.title: The Titan Games S1
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson redefines the athletic competition, giving exceptional men and women from all walks of life the chance to test their physical strength and mental fortitude for the chance to battle on Mount Olympus in hopes of becoming a Titan.

programme.title: The Titan Games S1
programme.desc: The competition continues with competitors pushing their bodies to the limit by battling opponents in unforgiving head-to-head challenges, designed by Dwayne Johnson. Winners will advance to the ultimate challenge of Mt. Olympus, the consummate athletic test of speed, strength, agility and endurance. The male and female competitors who conquer Mt. Olympus will become a Titan, and in the end, the Titans return to battle each other. One woman and one man will be crowned Titan Champions. Dwayne Johnson serves as host and Executive Producer, Liam McHugh and Alex Mendez commentate from the skybox and Cari Champion reports from inside the arena.

programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: Costa Rica: The Rise Of Nature
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: We explore the integral role that older animals play in their communities and investigate how animals learn over the course of their lives.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Human, plant, animal, bacteria, all have one inevitable thing in common; death. In this episode we discover the ways in which aging animals defy our usual understanding of the circle of life.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Witness how America's South and Midwest were ravaged by 148 twisters in just 18 hours.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: An inside look at the Battle of Midway, the aircraft used on both sides of the fight, and the dramatic story of one fighter pilot and his pivotal role in America’s first true victory of the Pacific War.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Okinawa was the site of the last battle of the last great war of the 20th century, with a casualty rate in the tens of thousands. Through it all, military cameramen risked their lives to film the conflict, from brutal land combat to fierce kamikaze attacks at sea.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: This documentary series shows five generations of jet engines. These fighter jets are capable of carrying bombs and soar close to the edge of space. The sixth generation of fighter jets began in 2020, and the 11th season has covered most of the air artillery since then.

programme.title: Shuttle Discovery's Last Mission
programme.desc: This documentary series shows five generations of jet engines. These fighter jets are capable of carrying bombs and soar close to the edge of space. The sixth generation of fighter jets began in 2020, and the 11th season has covered most of the air artillery since then.

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi has lost the handle to her music box and can't hear her music. Jess works out how to make instruments and get all the friends involved in making a little orchestra and performing a fantastic song to cheer mimi up.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess helps Mimi to find her little frend Sammy Snail who's gone missing. They check all the places she's seen him before and work out that if they follow the silvery train it leads right to him.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is given his very first kite by Mimi. It's very special indeed. He can't wait to fly it! But first he has to work out HOW!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi is shocked to find a dandelion plant in her lovely pink and purple garden. She didn't plant it there herself, so how on earth did the dandelion get there? Jess is determined to find out and in the process they work out how some seeds are transported by birds, some in the coats of animals and some in the wind. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see how many different types of seeds and flowers they can spot.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess sets out to re-assure his frightened friends by working out what the noise is in the sky that's so loud.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is hoping that soon it will snow so that they can make snow kittens and play in the snow like they did last year. First though he has to work out what the weather would have to be like for the snow to come..

programme.title: Casper's Scare School

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

programme.title: Problem Child in House
programme.desc: A collection of outrageous problems that you have never heard of! A great 'knowledge talk show' where problematic children who are struggling and fighting in the emotional rooftop room gain true wisdom about life and the world.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Queen's House
programme.desc: A revenge story about a woman in the top 1% starting over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true 'home'. A passionate drama of people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: Our Golden Days
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days. Whether now, in the past, or the future. A heartfelt family melodrama that resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: ROUND PLAYLIST
programme.desc: The program is intended to promote exchanges between Korea and ASEAN countries by utilizing popular music.

programme.title: The Seasons
programme.desc: A talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

programme.title: Oh My Venus
programme.desc: A love story between Kim Youngho, a flawless personal trainer struggling to overcome his childhood injury, and Kang Jueun, who used to be an icon of first love but is just an overweight lawyer now.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners who have left their familiar worlds behind and come to the unfamiliar land of Korea! A vivid, real-life adaptation story of foreigners trying to settle into Korean society for various reasons. This reality program warmly portrays their concerns about jobs, marriage, and parenting while living in Korea.

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible 2
programme.desc: The training academy from Dogs Are Incredible! For pet owners struggling with issues like biting, aggression, or excessive barking from their beloved dogs who've become part of the family. Experts from various fields provide customized training methods and tailored advice — helping unruly dogs transform into well-behaved companions!

programme.desc: A company's flagship idol is seemingly abandoned(?) by their own agency! Stepping away from life as a popular idol, the new journey begins.

programme.title: Boss in the Mirror
programme.desc: Korean celebrity-bosses go through self-examinations to create truly fulfilling workplaces.

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad members—Tai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tang—are involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Embark on the journey with two Thai artistes, Gun and Ticha, as they navigate the bustling city life and discover the serene outskirts of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad members—Tai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tang—are involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: A Sealed Book
programme.desc: The world descends into darkness when a sealed book, said to command the forces of the universe, is unearthed in an underground palace in the desert. As adventurers race to claim its power, the palace gates open, unleashing an unseen terror and heralding a catastrophe beyond imagination.

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhang’s custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.desc: Of all the things in the world, there are two that Reden loves the most: guns and women. The former he uses for self-defense, and the latter, for recreation. As cops probe into a case, Reden meets Divine who has just arrived from the States. Though modern in many ways, her values remain conservative.

programme.title: Ben Delubyo
programme.desc: After his dismissal from the police force due to insubordination, Ben (Bong Revilla, Jr.) decides to lead a quiet life as a mechanic. But just as he is beginning to enjoy his new-found peace, his hometown is beleaguered by crimes. To help contain the problems before they are blown into unimaginable proportions, a PNP general orders a police lieutenant (Charlene Gonzales) to get him back. Indeed, he returns, but this time, as a vigilante. Ironically, his most important assignment is to collar a notorious drug lord (Ronaldo Valdez) who happens to be the father of his girlfriend (Aileen Damiles). Now, Ben is torn between protecting the woman he loves or upholding the law.

programme.title: Nilalang
programme.desc: Nilalang tackles the underbelly of corrupt Philippine cops with the Japanese 'Yakuza' and its links to a centuries' old curse that may be responsible for the spate of serial killings happening in Manila.

programme.title: This Guy's in Love with U Mare
programme.desc: This Guy's in Love with U Mare is about an unlikely love triangle. Starring Vice Ganda, Luis Manzano and Toni Gonzaga.

programme.title: Hello, Universe!
programme.desc: Ariel (Janno Gibbs), a middle-aged man full of regrets, gets another chance to rewrite his past when he meets a magical figure who gives him the life he has always dreamt of. But at what cost?

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Girlfriend Na Pwede Na
programme.desc: Pam (Kim Molina), having been dumped by her long-time boyfriend, hires Isko (Jerald Napoles), to pretend to be her new boyfriend so to make her ex jealous.

programme.title: Revirginized
programme.desc: Carmela (Sharon Cuneta) gets to enjoy life again in a wild beach party. With young people and a hunk tattoo artist, she drowns herself in alcohol to forget her current self and renew her old self.

programme.title: My Bakit List
programme.desc: Bombarded with so much why's in her life, Dess (Louise delos Reyes) embarks on a soul searching journey. Unknown to her, she is about to face the biggest why of her life when she accidentally bumps into her ex-boyfriend who left her without any explanation.

programme.title: Saplot
programme.desc: Mystery unfolds when the family of a well-known ramp and commercial model was brutally massacred.

programme.title: Tag-Init
programme.desc: One mystery envelops a group of friends who goes out on a vacation. Will they find the real criminal or be caught with their own mesh?

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel (Joem Bascon) and Cynthia (Mercedes Cabral), a young couple with a child on the way, head back to Baguio to start over again. Everything seems to be falling into place for them - or so they think - until strange things start to happen in their house.

programme.title: Bitay Lethal Injection
programme.desc: A group of bad boys are terrorizing the campus scene with several students found raped and murdered. Brenda (Amalia Jones) survives and her policeman-boyfriend does his best to find the criminals.

programme.title: Ikaw na Sana
programme.desc: Blanca (Angelu de Leon) is a bubbly young woman with a positive view on life, but on the night she turns eighteen, a curse comes true and and destroys her face and dreams.

programme.title: Mission Impossible S4 E16 - The Falcon (Part 3)
programme.desc: Smart, stylish and suspenseful, MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE returns for its dynamic 4th season, captivating audiences with its glimpse into the world of international espionage.

programme.title: Bonanza S2 E20 - The Fugitive
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch in Virginia City, while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Bonanza S2 E21 - Vengeance
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch in Virginia City, while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: The Christmas Quest
programme.desc: Stefanie teams up with ex-husband Chase to go to Iceland at Christmastime in search of the legendary treasure of the Yule Lads.

programme.title: CSI S5 E16 - Big Middle
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.desc: Get ready for a gold rush as Rick and his team go in search of treasure that might be worth its weight in gold. These valuable possessions have the Pawn Stars team seeing dollar signs.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S2)
programme.desc: For centuries, secret codes have been embedded in sacred texts, ancient paintings, and even etched into the earth itself. Were they left as clues, warnings or something far more profound?

programme.title: The Death Coast
programme.desc: Jeff and his team's search for the wrecks of Mary, Joseph, and Neptune takes them further into uncharted territory. Jeff begins to suspect he may be on the verge of uncovering a field of stolen treasure.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: The team launches an incredible nighttime 200-drone light show experiment above the Triangle and the East Field leading to a startling sighting in the sky and new data that points toward possible answers.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)
programme.desc: In 2016, an illness strikes dozens of government officials in Cuba. Over the next few years, hundreds more are afflicted. But investigations raise more questions than answers about this bizarre epidemic.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Enormous, megalithic structures of mysterious origins. Could the ancient mysteries that exist on the Mediterranean islands of Malta be connected to local legends of alien visitation and hybrid beings?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)
programme.desc: Puma Punku in Bolivia features some of the largest stone blocks on Earth, each carved with incredible precision. Could new technology solve an old puzzle—and offer proof of alien intervention on Earth?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: The team has finally reached target depth in the Garden Shaft, but their drilling efforts may be thwarted by a legendary flood tunnel.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: A man with aspirations to writing crime novels ends up the star of his own breakout story when he tries to escape from one of Mississippi's oldest and most notorious prison farms, Parchman Penitentiary.

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1)
programme.desc: You thought your job was tough? Uncover the dangerous gigs of the past – from mercury-poisoned hat makers to kids crawling through chimneys – and imagine the risks behind everyday jobs of old.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: In our modern world, we tend to think that technology and scientific knowledge can help protect us from almost anything, including natural disasters. But is that really true?

programme.title: Astig
programme.desc: Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs made their living by putting one over small time con-artists. They became very good at what they were doing so that they were soon recruited into the big-time.

programme.title: Takas Sa Impiyerno
programme.desc: Hell is what the residents call their town. It is because Mayor Sebastian (Paquito Diaz) virtually sees the town as his own personal kingdom.

programme.title: SPO4 Santiago (Sharpshooter)
programme.desc: Bong Revilla, Jr, starred in this exciting film based on the real-life exploits of SPO4 Jimmy Santiago, SWAT member and sharp-shooter, who was idolized by the masses because he relentlessly went after hostage takers, hold-uppers and all sorts of criminals.

programme.title: Buhay Mo'y Buhay Ko Rin
programme.desc: They're both members of the police force: he's an undercover assigned to crack a notorious syndicate, and she's a traffic officer tasked to manage the city's clogged streets.

programme.title: Extranghero
programme.desc: After causing a series of troubles in his hometown, Botong (Andrew E) leaves for Manila to look for his long-lost mother. But he ends up in a mental asylum where he meets the beautiful Kristy.

programme.title: Una Kang Naging Akin
programme.desc: Is there any way for Gabby to regain his other "memory" and remember the family he left behind?

programme.title: Estudyante Blues (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The hit song by well-known folk singer, Freddie Aguilar, "Anak", was the basis for this light-hearted tale about campus life. Escapades of eight young men who were classmates in school but who also had to deal with their personal problems.

programme.title: Working Boys
programme.desc: The wacky trio of Tito, Vic & Joey became a quartet with the addition of Bagets star, Herbert Bautista. They played jacks-of-all-trades and masters of none in this take-off from the acclaimed Working Girls.

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Lihim
programme.desc: Bianca and her friends sailed off to the pristine and beautiful Palawan for a few days of fun. Living in the city had made them hungry for the isolation an island resort offers. But then, tragedy struck just when they were starting to have fun.

programme.title: Jabidah Massacre
programme.desc: Based on the expose made by the late Senator Benigno "Ninoy" Aquino, Jabidah Massacre chronicles the story of how a group of recruits are turned into soldiers for a secret mission - the invasion of Sabah.

programme.title: Ang Agimat Ni Pepe
programme.desc: Pepe, the naughty ward of parish priest Padre Lusano always gets in trouble with Chino, the young farmer who owns the chickens that Pepe loves to shoot at.

programme.title: Batangueño Kabitenyo
programme.desc: This is a story of Magno,who is from Batangas and has the ability to attract women like flies.He goes to Manila hoping to change.

programme.title: Hikikomori Pilgrimage
programme.desc: Five young men from around Japan, once withdrawn from society - a phenomenon known as hikikomori - embark on a 1,200-kilometer pilgrimage around the island of Shikoku, on a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Stories from Kobe's Western Cuisin
programme.desc: Western-style cuisine is a comfort food the people of Kobe have passed down with love. It gave them strength as they recovered from disaster. What stories lie behind its rich, brown demi-glace sauce?

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #4 Winter
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: A ride through Hokkaido in early summer. We meet an artisan teaching handicrafts of the indigenous Ainu to the next generation, and a legendary trainer of an unusual horse race.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Cleaning. More than a chore, it's a way to calm the mind. Spaces, products, and system designs to encourage cleaning - explore a unique Japanese aesthetic and the potential of cleaning.

programme.title: Design Ah neo: Toilet Paper
programme.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Toilet Paper.

programme.title: Mitateru-phose #2
programme.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. This episode looks at words related to sound. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Edo's Rush Hour
programme.desc: Edo was a city of waterways. The Yoroi Ferry transported people across the Nihonbashi River, one of its main commercial arteries. For the captain, it was a high-pressure job requiring skill and guts.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from January 16, Day 6 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: NHK WORLD SELECTION
programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Find out about Japan's emergency food options that meet the needs of various people. Also discover the rolling stock method, a smart way to stockpile emergency food.

programme.desc: Hishikawa Seiichi (Video and craft artist) visits Tottori. Dyeing firms make fishing flags with vivid, hand-drawn designs that carry the feelings of both fishermen and people sending them gifts.

programme.desc: The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: It's the first day of school, and Sharkdog's not allowed to come; well, that's never stopped him before!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Alex's french-fry costume gets him carried off by a flock of hungry seagulls. // Humdinger and Kitties take the lighthouse from Seal Island.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: A flock of migrating ducks settles in Builder Cove! It's up to Rubble & Crew to help the ducks start moving south.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora helps her friend Mito the Yeti see the beach for the first time and he even wins the sandcastle competition! // On her way to the new bike park, Dora teaches Selena the Snake how to ride a bicycle.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia can't decide on the best gift for Grandma. // Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie. // Tim fakes it to prove he's just as cool as Kai's cousin.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: The kids become the parents and the parents become the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa Pig's best friend, Suzy Sheep, comes over to visit.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: For the very first time, the Barbababies will take the train and sleep in a hotel. // Barbouille crafted a magnificent snowman that the children named Bobo.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are joining the police department! With the help of their new police pal, Officer Anna, Blaze transforms into a super-fast police car to lend a helping hand (or tire) to any truck in trouble.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdinger’s Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay All-Stars!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When Speed Meister builds his own station for reusing trash, the pups have to clean up the mess all over Builder Cove. // After a baby duckling follows them home, Rubble & Crew use their construction know-how to bring the duckling back to its home.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help the Bunny Boyz boy band get super clean and sparkly before their big show! // Dora and Boots track down Osito, Isabela's lost teddy bear, and get him back before she wakes up.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora gets a new puppy that makes her cat Lucky jealous. After he runs away, Dora tracks Lucky down to remind him of how loved he is. / Today is the championship game, but all of Dora's friends have a cold. Dora helps them feel better in time to play!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thésée", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. // Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Young François witnesses the birth of Barbapapa. // Barbapapa is a prisoner in a zoo.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!

programme.desc: Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.desc: When Speed Meister's rollercoaster sends a pet playdate out of control, Rubble & Crew save the day with a bigger, better, and safer coaster. // The Bark Yard safety inspection is today! But will Motor go boom and cost the Crew a gold safety star?

programme.desc: When Marshall decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back! // When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they must rescue a run-away kitty on a run-away Snow Cat!

programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Keep up with the latest news from all over the globe with Focus on France 24. Focus programme provides exclusive reports from Monday to Friday at 7.50 am Paris time. Find out what's going on in the world of economy, politics, culture, sport, medicine, ecology. Focus has it all covered for you. Short videos contain facts, interviews with real people, numbers, statistics, everything you need to be aware of recent events in the world and of what is actually going on.

But little does he know that she plans to kill both him and the princess, and that the return of the treasure will mean the extinction of mankind.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Jealousy
programme.desc: Model Min is admitted to a hospital, but mysteriously falls to her death at night. Rumour has it that the hospital is haunted. Subsequently, Min's photographer begins receiving eerie phone calls, the writer loses consciousness in a bizarre car accident, and her friend mysteriously disappears…

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple starts to experience some terrifying incidents, including the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters were brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. Thirty years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: August 29, 2006, Riverside County, CA. Deputies from the Riverside County Sheriff's Department respond to the scene of an abandoned vehicle in a remote area of the Gavilan Hills.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When the supposed great-niece of Marilyn Monroe, Krystal Jean Baker, 13, is found dead beneath a bridge in Texas' Bayou Country, investigators are stumped.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: After being pursued by handsome Kevin Lewis, Amanda can't wait to marry her new man. But on their honeymoon, Amanda discovers a different side to Kevin — he likes things done a certain way.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: An American Dream becomes a tragedy when San Antonio businesswoman Andreen McDonald goes missing. Four years later, her husband, Air Force Major Andre McDonald, is on trial for her murder.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When reliable 22-year-old, Molly Jane Matheson, didn't show up for work, her mother Tracy drove to her Fort Worth, Texas apartment to check on her.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A shooting suspect begins cutting himself with a pocket knife after investigators leave him alone in the interrogation room; a woman breaks down after telling police that she drowned her grandmother.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A man breaks down sobbing after admitting to stabbing his mom; an actress tells detectives how and why she shot her estranged uncle; a suspected murderer tries to broker an immunity deal; and more.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Kim Edwards and Lucas Markham were both outsiders from troubled homes. They felt they understood each other when no one else did. Together they made a plan to get rid of the mum and sister Kim resented.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Richard Ramirez terrorised Southern California in the mid-1980s, and anyone could be a target. Growing up yearning for a father figure, he found mentorship with his sadistic cousin.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: The peaceful town of Mountain City, TN, is rocked when a beloved young couple is found brutally murdered in their home.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A young man is arrested for violating a restraining order by sending a text message. While in Virginia Beach, an 18-year-old woman is arrested for assault and battery after a fight with her brother.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Before he hunted down his first victim in the wilds of Alaska, Robert Hansen was working at his father's bakery in a small town in Iowa, slowly developing an animosity towards women.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: The family of a DUI victim screams at the defendant; a Sovereign Citizen argues with the judge over bond; a sexual assault victim is interviewed by her attacker in court; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: The judge must excuse the jury after an accused double-murderer goes on a rant; DUI defendant won't listen to her lawyer; laundromat vandal tries to suck up to the judge; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: A rookie detective is pushed to the brink searching for a beloved man who ultimately turns up brutally murdered. Bringing the killer to justice could hang on the testimony of a jailhouse informant.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: A popular lifeguard is found dead at the community swimming pool, causing a wave of terror to flood through Leawood, Kansas.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: Tara Grinstead's sudden disappearance goes unexplained for 11 years until a surprising statement to law enforcement from Bo Dukes, a former student, names his friend and former classmate as her killer.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)
programme.desc: Detective Angela Carter takes over the case of a missing teenage girl and wonders if the key to her disappearance could lie shockingly close to home.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Elizabeth Thomas Story with Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: Five years after she was groomed and abducted by the most popular teacher in school, Elizabeth Thomas shares new revelations about her ordeal, with famed kidnapping survivor Elizabeth Smart.

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, Émilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Métiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les Triplés
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Vic discovers that Marie has been accepted for her internship in New York and wants to go too, but her father refuses categorically. Sigis and Ian organise a surprise party for Évelyne.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo
programme.desc: Julien and Vincent Gagnon, monozygotic twins, embark on a scientific quest to discover what unites or separates them. It's not quite the game of spot the difference, but almost! On average, 5.2 mutations distinguish identical twins at birth. How is that possible?

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison !
programme.desc: The tour begins with a visit to a renovated farmhouse before moving on to a prefabricated house.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: The Grump: In Search Of An Escort
programme.desc: The Grump, a stubborn old Finnish farmer, goes on a quest to find a replacement for his beloved second-hand car. He goes to Germany to do so, but ends up settling accounts with his past.

programme.title: The Traveller: The Naked King
programme.desc: Captain Kandinsky follows the trail of a mysterious notebook linking unsolved crimes. Guided by Commissioner Macena’s clues, Kandinsky begins the hunt for the predator behind all the murders.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Domingo (2021)
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Standing up for Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelo’s mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mother’s last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: The Traveller: At the End of the Night
programme.desc: Laurent, the brother of Captain Kandinsky, gets into an argument with a young woman who accuses him of harassment. All suspicion inevitably falls on Laurent when she is discovered dead the next day, and it is up to Kandinsky to clear his brother’s name.

programme.title: A House In Jerusalem
programme.desc: Grappling with the loss of her mother, Rebecca and her father relocate to Jerusalem for a fresh start. In the eerie Valley of the Ghosts, strange occurrences unfold, and Rebecca embarks on a journey to unravel the mysteries within the old house and city.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Calcutta
programme.desc: Having just lost her daughter and disillusioned with her marriage, Ela decides to start an independent life of her own. Unable to secure a housing loan, she uses her boss, the owner of a ponzi scheme, to get what she wants.

programme.title: Milk
programme.desc: When young working mother Amelia is notified that her 3-month-old son is underweight, she has to decide what’s best for her son while battling her own insecurities of motherhood.

programme.title: Bad Investigate
programme.desc: A corrupt cop sets out to hunt down a dangerous drug dealer who is seeking revenge for the death of his brother. Also trying to catch the same criminal is an FBI agent.

programme.title: The Inland Road
programme.desc: After surviving a car crash when running away from home, Tia finds herself having nowhere to go. Seeking out the family of the crash victim, she moves in with them and threatens to upend the family’s delicate balance.
